comment:
* Utilities to map between radio constants.
 *
 * @hide

methods.name: public static int getDuplexModeForEutranBand(int band)
methods.comment:
* Gets the duplex mode for the given EUTRAN operating band. * *

See 3GPP 36.101 sec 5.5-1 for calculation * * @param band The EUTRAN band number * @return The duplex mode of the given EUTRAN band

methods.name: public static int getOperatingBandForEarfcn(int earfcn)
methods.comment:
* Gets the EUTRAN Operating band for a given downlink EARFCN. * *

See 3GPP 36.101 sec 5.7.3-1 for calculation. * * @param earfcn The downlink EARFCN * @return Operating band number, or {@link #INVALID_BAND} if no corresponding band exists
